name: Philosopher's Stone
description: A legendary alchemical substance capable of turning base metals into gold.

name: Elixir of Life
description: Grants the drinker eternal life and youth.

name: Aurum Potabile
description: Potable gold, believed to restore health and prolong life.

name: Alchemist's Fire
description: A fierce, bright burning flame used by alchemists for their work.

name: Quintessence
description: The fifth element, or the essence of a thing in its purest and most concentrated form.

name: Celestial Orb
description: A mystical orb used for scrying and divination, revealing hidden truths.

name: Djinni Lamp
description: A magical lamp rumored to house a powerful djinn who can grant wishes.

name: Mermaid's Tears
description: Luminous pearls said to hold the essence of the sea and grant wishes with a mermaid's voice.

name: Mandrake Root
description: A forked, humanoid root believed to possess magical properties and a powerful scream.

name: Moonstone Vial
description: A vial enchanted to capture moonlight, said to amplify healing and psychic abilities.

name: Invisibility Cloak
description: A cloak woven with magic, granting the wearer temporary invisibility.

name: Claws of the Chimera
description: Razor-sharp claws reputedly taken from a mythical chimera, granting unnatural strength and ferocity.
price_note: Due to the dangerous nature of this artifact, a waiver must be signed before purchase.

name: Grimoire of Shadows
description: An ancient spellbook containing forbidden knowledge and powerful magic. (Use with caution!)
price_note: This item is restricted to experienced mages only. Contact us for purchase verification.

name: Phoenix Feather
description: A single feather from a mythical phoenix, said to possess regenerative properties and the ability to bring warmth and light to any situation.
